TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tayax, title = Tayax, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tayax} }

S.FORM: alang Tayax ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Nahuy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 38 buwan, 142 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 99 kyan ku 141 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 1 kyan ku 1 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 94 , Amis 1 , Paywan 1 , binah lihuyan s'uli 1 . maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Tayax hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Tayax hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Tayax hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Tayax hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Tayax hya' ga Ponaway. tay 'zil na Tayax hya' ga Plmwan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
